name: AutoPostcode
author: AutoPostcode

sections.description:
Our plugin allows your website visitors to experience a faster checkout by simply entering their postcode and selecting their address from a dropwdown list.

Address postcode lookup

Adds an address dropdown list upon postcode entry on your WooCommerce checkout page.

AutoPostcode helps your users to experience a smoother and faster checkout by simply entering their postcode and selecting their address. This can help to improve your website conversion rate, reduce abandoned cart and also minimise shipping errors.

Improve Conversion Rates

The faster it is for a user to checkout, the more conversions you can receive. This plugin speeds your checkout.

Reduce Shipping Errors

By enabling the users to select an address from a pre-defined address list reduces shipping errors as there is minimal chance of typos and incorrectly entered addresses.

How to Use

Simply create an account on app.autopostcode.com and generate your secret key. Enter the key into your Auto Postcode Plugin settings. That’s it.

Automatic Updates

Our plugin is regularly updated to enhance the functionality, user experience and security features. The plugin can be automatically updated by enabling “Auto-Updates”.
sections.installation:
1. Create a company or agency account on app.autopostcode.com
  2. Generate a secret key
  3. Enter the key into the plugin settings

Email info@autopostcode.com for support enquiries.
sections.faq:
Is the plugin free?

It is free to install the plugin and we provide every new user with 100 free credits. After that you must subscribe to a package from your Auto Postcode account.

Can I create mulitple accounts?

We recommend creating an agency account if you have multiple websites so that you can manage your credits centrally from one place for all accounts.

How much does it cost?

Please visit our website on autopostcode.com to view our packages.
sections.changelog:
1.0 2022-02-02

  • Introduce new address postcode lookup integration with woocommerce

short_description: This plugin adds UK address postcode lookup functionality on the checkout page of your website and is exclusively designed for WooCommerce.
